channel.title: Source question and Web server
channel.description:
hey everyone iam here just to ask some question is there any source that when i download it have this stuff include: mainmenu thing pop out everytime u log in Welcome screen code so i can change to my server name and it have gold crown and silver for admin and mod for ex: if iam a admin the gold crown will show beside my name and when i talk it show crown too , goes same with mod Rs music , full monster and npc code and monster too
Other question: how you put the server in web? and how can i make my own quest instead of the quest that look same like rs

item.title: Source question and Web server
item.dc:creator: @cawagula cawagula
item.description:
@cawagula wrote:

[quote=“masterlouah, post:1, topic:4979”]hey everyone iam here just to ask some question
is there any source that when i download it have this stuff include:
mainmenu thing pop out everytime u log in
Welcome screen code so i can change to my server name
and it have gold crown and silver for admin and mod
for ex: if iam a admin the gold crown will show beside my name and when i talk it show crown too , goes same with mod
Rs music , full monster and npc code and monster too

Other question:
how you put the server in web?
and how can i make my own quest instead of the quest that look same like rs[/quote]

is there any source that when i download it have this stuff include:
mainmenu thing pop out everytime u log in
Welcome screen code so i can change to my server name
and it have gold crown and silver for admin and mod
for ex: if iam a admin the gold crown will show beside my name and when i talk it show crown too , goes same with mod
Rs music , full monster and npc code and monster too - YES

how you put the server in web? - Learn how to integrate Java into webpages
and how can i make my own quest instead of the quest that look same like rs - Learn Java.

Simple, learn yourself, and don’t expect us to do the work for you

Read full topic
